mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification(diary_id, send_member_id, receive_member_id, content) VALUES(#{diaryId}, #{sendMemberId}, #{receiveMemberId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET checked = #{checked} WHERE id = #{ntfId}
mapper.select: SELECT diary_id FROM notification WHERE id = #{ntfId}
SELECT IFNULL(d.id, 0) AS diary_id FROM notification AS n LEFT JOIN diary AS d ON d.id = n.diary_id WHERE n.id = #{ntfId};
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(receive_member_id), 0) FROM notification WHERE id = #{ntfId}
